INVALID_FORMAT.name: INVALID_FORMAT
INVALID_FORMAT.message: The format of the received message is invalid.

UNKNOWN_OBJECT.name: UNKNOWN_OBJECT
UNKNOWN_OBJECT.message: The object requested is unknown to that specific node.

UNFINDABLE_OBJECT.name: UNFINDABLE_OBJECT
UNFINDABLE_OBJECT.message: The object requested could not be found in the node's network.

INVALID_HANDSHAKE.name: INVALID_HANDSHAKE
INVALID_HANDSHAKE.message: The peer sent other validly formatted messages before sending a valid hello message.

INVALID_TX_CONSERVATION.name: INVALID_TX_CONSERVATION
INVALID_TX_CONSERVATION.message: The transaction does not satisfy the weak law of conservation.

INVALID_BLOCK_COINBASE.name: INVALID_BLOCK_COINBASE
INVALID_BLOCK_COINBASE.message: The block coinbase transaction is invalid.

INVALID_GENESIS.name: INVALID_GENESIS
INVALID_GENESIS.message: The block has a previd of null but it isn't genesis.
